tests.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE document SYSTEM "CommonMark.dtd">
<document xmlns="http://commonmark.org/xml/1.0">
  <paragraph>
    <emph>
      <text>This is an example input</text>
    </emph>
  </paragraph>

documentBegin
emphasis: This is an example input
documentEnd
